# select

> 多表查询

``` abap
TABLES MARC.
TABLES MAKT.

SELECT-OPTIONS: S-WERKS FOR MARC-WERKS.
DATA: BEGIN OF GT_TG OCCURS 0,
         MATNR TYPE MARC-MATNR,
         WERKS TYPE MARC-WERKS,
         EKGRP TYPE MARC-EKGRP,
         MAKTX TYPE MAKT-MAKTX,
          END OF GT_TG.
START-OF-SELECTION.

SELECT MARC~MATNR
         WERKS
         EKGRP
         MAKTX
INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF TABLE GT_TG
FROM MARC INNER 
    JOIN MAKT ON MARC~MATNR = MAKT~MATNR
    WHERE MARC~WERKS IN S-WERKS AND MAKT~SPRAS = sy-langu.

LOOP AT GT_TG.
WRITE: / GT_TG-MATNR,GT_TG-WERKS,GT_TG-EKGRP,GT_TG-MAKTX.
ENDLOOP.
```
